item.description:
We are going to have a meeting and talk about the details about the new Training Meetups! Email me with any questions!!!!!

There is not a shelter in this area that we can be under. So Im hoping that it does not rain and in the meantime maybe I can find a place that at least the soles can meet to get things going. If anyone has any idea please feel free to email me or start a message conversation on this meetup!

In the meantime PLEASE answer the questions that I made up so I know where everyone is and I can start figuring out what kind a training to start with. For example: Do I need to start everyone in a "Puppy type Class" or "Intermediate type Class?"

Thank You All!
item.how_to_find_us: In the Parking lot with the Dogs!

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: TRAINING MEETING
